root.name: Hokuto no Ken Online
root.description: OverviewThis game was to be an MMORPG title that was released on the PC on the 24th of July 2008 whereby the player can select a class(possibly choosing either a Hokuto or Nanto fighter) and roam around the Hokuto No Ken apocalyptic world.After a year, an expansion was added called "Hokuto No Ken Online Heroes" which gives the players the ability to play as the main characters from the manga.Selectable HeroesKenshiroRaohJagiAmibaShinReiYudaMamiyaHowever despite the expansion, it wasn't popular enough to become a fully fledged game and as a result, the servers were shut down on the 30th of September, 2009.
